channel.title: Tor over tor tor browser bundle
channel.description: Scenario. - Whonix Gateway running as guest on debian with kvm. - Kali running as guest on the same debian with nic configured as internal network "whonix" My questions are: - if i install tor browser bundle inside kali i create a tor over tor scenario ? - in this case how can i use tbb without creating a tor over tor ? i've tried using TOR_SKIP_LAUNCH=1 and changed proxy (tbb) from localhost to 10.152.152.10 (whonix gateway) with no luck can someone explain me where i am wrong. Sorry for my terrible english ...... many thanks

item.title: Tor over tor tor browser bundle
item.dc:creator: Kali
item.description:
Scenario.

  • Whonix Gateway running as guest on debian with kvm.
  • Kali running as guest on the same debian with nic configured as internal network "whonix"
    My questions are:
  • if i install tor browser bundle inside kali i create a tor over tor scenario ?
  • in this case how can i use tbb without creating a tor over tor ?
    i’ve tried using TOR_SKIP_LAUNCH=1 and changed proxy (tbb) from localhost to 10.152.152.10 (whonix gateway) with no luck
    can someone explain me where i am wrong.
    Sorry for my terrible english … many thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Tor over tor tor browser bundle
